Name: Bowman
Description:
The Division of Bonner consists of:

  • part of the Redland City Council, and
  • part of the Brisbane City Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: Farming, retail and industrial activities. Tourism on the islands and a winery at Mount Cotton.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of David Bowman, 1860-1916, one of the first members of the Labour party in the Queensland Parliament (1899-1902 and 1904-1916) who rendered valuable service in the interests of the community.
Members:

DemographicRating: Outer Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and containing large areas of recent suburban expansion
